articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Tahlia McGrath powers Australia into T20 World Cup semi-finals - The Guardian
articles.description: Tahlia McGrath showed why she’s the world’s top T20 batter with a 29-ball fifty as Australia made light work of South Africa to roar into the World Cup semis
articles.content:
Australia marched into the semi-finals of the T20 World Cup with a six-wicket win over hosts South Africa, sparked by Tahlia McGraths 33-ball 57 and Georgia Warehams 2-8 in Gqeberha.

articles.description: The mystery of how the ancient city of Great Zimbabwe prospered for centuries in a region plagued by droughts has finally been solved. The ruins of the first major city in southern Africa, Great Zimbabwe, can be found in the mountains of southeastern Zimbabwe…
